meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jeff Xie Alan Koolik Cooper Lair Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6895.

div.div:
2014 Teen Tournament final game 2.
Last game of Season 30.

td.p: Jeff Xie, a junior from Edison, New Jersey (subtotal of $15,000)
Alan Koolik, a junior from Boca Raton, Florida (subtotal of $25,000)
Cooper Lair, a sophomore from Little Rock, Arkansas (subtotal of $200)

tr.td: INTERNET JARGON
MOUNTAINS
WANNA DANCE?
3-LETTER WORDS WITH 2 VOWELS
THE STORY OF HIS LIFE
ATTACK OF THE MOVIE MONSTERS

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '[Alex reads "coo" as "C-O-O".]
(Jeff: What is cooperate?)

cool

Jeff
Triple Stumper
')
